name: In Your Face, Chicken Apocalypse Spectacular
name_original: In Your Face, Chicken Apocalypse Spectacular
description:
Believe it or not, this is my first ever Unity game, created as part of my studies at GCU.

It's a mediocre shooter at best, but I had incredible fun making it, hopefully it will be fun to play for a few minutes, if only for the novelty factor.

Enjoy!
